detectors.description:
AccountProxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/kovan/sorted/0.8.0/96790CfECbcf73a1D533BC26Cf0e2F59776E0B1A_AccountProxy.sol/96790CfECbcf73a1D533BC26Cf0e2F59776E0B1A_AccountProxy.sol#8-44) may be an upgradeable proxy.
_opCodeAddress is declared in the proxy.
AccountProxy.delegate(bytes4)._opCodeAddress (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/kovan/sorted/0.8.0/96790CfECbcf73a1D533BC26Cf0e2F59776E0B1A_AccountProxy.sol/96790CfECbcf73a1D533BC26Cf0e2F59776E0B1A_AccountProxy.sol#32) gets value from a cross-contract call: opCenter.getOpCodeAddress(_sig)
OperationCenterInterface appears to be a Registry contract for the proxy
The address of OperationCenterInterface is stored as a state variable: AccountProxy.opCenter
Could not find setter for opCenter
Missing compatibility check in AccountProxy.fallback()
Missing compatibility check in AccountProxy.receive()
